disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from The Darkin Blade.

blurb.value: Active: Aatrox slams his greatsword down up to 3 times before it goes on cooldown, with each having an unique area of effect and dealing physical damage. The damage is increased if enemies are hit by a telegraphed Sweetspot within the area.

description.value: Aatrox can activate The Darkin Blade three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 1 second static  cooldown between casts. If Aatrox does not recast the ability within 4 seconds, the ability goes on cooldown.

description2.value: Each of the three casts has Aatrox perform an acrobatic strike with his greatsword, dealing physical damage in a distinct area. Enemies hit within a telegraphed Sweetspot in the strike are dealt 50% bonus damage and are knocked up for 0.25 seconds. The second and third cast deal 25% and 50% more damage than the first cast respectively.

description3.value: First Cast: Aatrox's first strike affects a 625 × 180-unit rectangular area in the target direction, with Aatrox centered on the back line and the Sweetspot at the farthest edge.

description4.value: Second Cast: Aatrox's second strike affects a trapezoidal area in the target direction, with the Sweetspot at the farthest edge. The hitbox begins 100-units behind Aatrox and extends 475-units in front of him, measuring between 300 and 500-units wide from behind to in front.

description5.value: Third Cast: Aatrox's third strike affects a 300-radius circular area centered on a target location 200 units in front of him, with a 180-radius Sweetspot within.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The highlighted areas denote the sweetspot - enemies are affected where the two areas overlap (See edge range and center range). The first and second casts function like any point-blank AOE (i.e. an effect centered on the caster). An enemy is considered to be hit by the ability based on edge range - i.e. if any part of your gameplay radius is within the hitbox, you are affected. The third cast, as well as the Sweetspot for the first and second cast, function like ground-targeted abilities. An enemy is considered to be hit by the ability based on center range - i.e. an enemy's center has to be within the hitbox to be affected. As implied by the previous point, the Sweetspot for the first and second cast is implemented as separate areas of effect to the main component of the ability. Enemies must be within both areas to trigger the bonus damage and knock up. Deathbringer Stance's cooldown reduction only checks if an enemy is within the Sweetspot - meaning it is possible to trigger the cooldown reduction without affecting an enemy. Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. The hitbox and Aatrox's model are fixed to the initial target direction. Aatrox's facing-direction, for effects such as Petrifying Gaze, is the direction he is moving, and not the direction the model is facing. All damage modifiers stack multiplicatively. Damage dealt by the Sweetspot of The Darkin Blade is a cosmetic critical strike. Type Cast time Attacking Disabled Abilities Umbral Dash can be cast. Other abilities are disabled. Movement Disabled Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled All the other item-actives are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by N/A Interrupted by Death

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Infernal Chains.

blurb.value: Active: Aatrox smashes the ground, creating a chain that stops on the first enemy hit, dealing physical damage. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be pulled back to the center and take the damage again.

description.value: Active: Aatrox smashes the ground in the target direction, creating a chain that stops on the first enemy hit, dealing physical damage, doubled against minions, and slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

description2.value: If Infernal Chains hits an enemy champion or large monster, they are revealed and are chained to the impact area. If the chained enemy is still in the impact area after 1.5 seconds, they are dragged to the center and take the same damage again.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value:
* The impact area is oriented relative to Aatrox's position when the projectile hits, not where the projectile originated from.
 The location that the target is dragged to is not at the target's original location, but slightly closer towards Aatrox's position when the zone expires.
 There's a small delay in checking if the target is in or outside the Infernal Chains area. Because of this it is still possible to drag the target if they leave the zone at the last instant.
 Infernal Chains will fire from where Aatrox is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Umbral Dash.

blurb.value: Passive: Aatrox heals for the portion of the damage he deals to champions.

blurb2.value: Active: He dashes in the target direction.

description.value: Passive: Aatrox heals for a percentage of the non-periodic post-mitigation damage he deals against enemy champions.

description2.value: Active: Aatrox dashes in the target direction.

description3.value: Umbral Dash resets Aatrox's basic attack timer.

description4.value: Umbral Dash can be cast during his other abilities without cancelling them, and vice versa.

description5.value: Umbral Dash may cast across terrain with an increased dash range. This may upscale his dash speed so that the dash takes the same total time as the standard maximum-range dash.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The dash distance can be extended to up-to 500 units when targeting across terrain. It will only extend for the distance needed to cross the wall. If Umbral Dash is cast in the same direction Aatrox is moving, he will be unable to buffer commands that require him to move. * Aatrox's model darkens for 1.5 seconds upon casting Umbral Dash, which is a remnant from a buff he received before it got removed.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from World Ender.

blurb.value: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining  decaying bonus movement speed.

blurb2.value: While the effect lasts, he has increased size,  attack damage, and self-healing.

description.value: Active: Aatrox unleashes his true demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and monsters and slowing them by up to 99% for 3 seconds. For the next 10 seconds, Aatrox is ghosted and gains  bonus movement speed, decaying by 10% of the current bonus every 0.25 seconds.

description2.value: While transformed, Aatrox gains  bonus attack damage and 5% increased size, and receives increased self-healing from all sources, except  spell vamp. *

description3.value: With each enemy champion takedown, World Ender is extended by 5 seconds, refreshing its effects, up to the original amount.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * His resource bar indicates the remaining duration of World Ender. World Ender persists through resurrection effects. World Ender will cast from wherever Aatrox is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

flavorsound.value: "I am Aatrox, I am the World Ender!"
